content:
Keryx Notification Service

  • A light-weight, many-to-many communication service between applications or people

  • Publish and subscribe model

  • Recipient defined notification filters

  • Scalable large-scale distribution

  • Decoupling of sources and sinks

  • Structured textual information, free extension, efficient parsing

  • A nervous system for the Internet
